name: Glass Golem
description: The Glass Golem is a small construct made entirely from glass, designed to act as a guardian for valuable treasures.
memorable: Its ability to resist many magical attacks combined with the vulnerability to bludgeoning makes it an intriguing foe.
goals: To protect specific areas or treasures from intruders.
relations: Often created by spellcasters as guardians.
environment: Typically found in places of importance, such as treasure vaults or magical laboratories.
strengths: Immune to poison and psychic damage, resistant to physical damage from nonmagical attacks, and has Magic Resistance.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to bludgeoning damage which can compromise its structure.
attacks: Utilizes a Shard attack that deals slashing damage with a decent probability to hit.
most_powerful_ability: Magic Resistance provides the golem with an advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
additional_information: Immutable Form makes it immune to spells altering its form.
Can retaliate with a Shard attack when receiving bludgeoning damage.
test_queries: vulnerable glass golem with slashing attack
